name: Visual Novel Asset #04
description:
Maris is part of the "Gene Eden" sprite series.

Maris never hesitates to speak what's on her mind, whether it be in the form of sarcasm or unappreciated pun. Similarly to Uriah she jumps heads-on into action first, unintentionally causing trouble to the group more often than she would admit.

This version features:

  • A fullbody sprite (493x1200)
  • PSD file (mix -match expressions)
  • 3 Outfit (1 Base + 2 Add.)
  • 7 Emotes (5 Base + 2 Add.)

This asset can be used for both non-commercial and commercial purposes.

This work is licensed under CC BY 4.0 

A free version is available for download here.
